moves.1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 e6 4. Nc3 Nf6: A sacrifice that may have been a mistake but look what comes next -
moves.10... d4: Trying to avoid opening the d column.
moves.11. Bd2: A nice move towards the 2 Bishops in the middle.
moves.11... dxc3 12. Bxc3: 2 very strong Bishops attacking the king section.
moves.12... Re8 13. g4 Bxg4 14. Rhg1 Bd6 15. Q: He did all the setups to the attack and I fell into his trap.
moves.15... Bxf3: And this is the mistake that cost me the game although I'm in a big advantage.
moves.16... g6 17. Qxg6+: Rxg6 is faster mate but it doesn't matter.
